title: How Many Calories in Gatorade?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in Gatorade per 20 oz bottle, including carbs, sugars, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown for quick reference.
assumptions: 20 fl oz (591 ml) bottle of original Gatorade Thirst Quencher; fruit punch flavor; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand formulation, serving size, and any dilutions or additions. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 20 oz bottle of Gatorade contains about 130 calories, primarily from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 20 oz bottle of Gatorade?
faqs.a: Approximately 130 calories for original Gatorade Thirst Quencher.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Gatorade?
faqs.a: About 34 g of carbohydrates, all from sugars, per 20 oz bottle.

faqs.q: Does Gatorade have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's mainly carbs, electrolytes, and water.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Gatorade?
faqs.a: Around 270 mg per 20 oz bottle, helpful for hydration during exercise.
Yes, Gatorade Zero has 0 calories but retains electrolytes and flavor.
